job_tasks.phrase: ontwerpen en implementeren van AI-oplossingen gebaseerd op large language models (LLM's)
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the design and implementation of AI solutions using LLMs, which falls under the 'Modeling' category.

job_tasks.phrase: analyseren en voorbereiden van datasets voor optimale modelprestaties
job_tasks.justification: This describes the preparation and analysis of datasets for model performance, a core aspect of the 'Modeling' task.

job_tasks.phrase: verbeteren van de kwaliteit en nauwkeurigheid van tekst modellen
job_tasks.justification: Improving text models relates to the refinement and enhancement of AI models, fitting into the 'Modeling' category.

job_tasks.phrase: testen, valideren en continu optimaliseren van ontwikkelde oplossingen
job_tasks.justification: This phrase covers testing, validation, and continuous optimization, which are key components of MLOps (Operations Engineering).
Implementing AI solutions implies building and integrating them into a system, which is part of 'Software Development'.
The term 'developed solutions' points towards the engineering and building of software, aligning with 'Software Development'.

job_tasks.phrase: zorgen voor een veilige en verantwoorde toepassing van AI-technologieën
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring safe and responsible application of AI technologies involves building secure and ethical software systems, fitting 'Software Development'.
This phrase indicates the role's contribution to business goals (helping entrepreneurs), aligning with 'Business Understanding'.

job_tasks.phrase: Automatisering speelt hierbij een cruciale rol
job_tasks.justification: Highlighting the crucial role of automation in business context shows understanding of business drivers, fitting 'Business Understanding'.

soft_skills.phrase: continu wordt bijgeschoold in de nieuwste technologieën
zorgen voor een veilige en verantwoorde toepassing van AI-technologieën

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the design, implementation, and improvement of AI solutions based on large language models (LLMs). This, combined with the need to analyze datasets for model performance and optimize solutions, aligns directly with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.
